text: Hi, we are looking for a HubSpot and Magento integration expert for one of our projects. It mostly about bi-direction mapping of custom fields between  both tools. Can anyone help please?

Hello everyone,
Can anyone help me with some questions regarding robot.txt X HubSpot ?
I’m used with Wordpress, but now on HubSpot I’m a little bit confusing how I can setup it properly to have a …./robot.txt URL
Thanks
